a1: The tool supports MP4, WebM, and most common video formats that your browser can play. Simply drag and drop your video file to get started.
q2: What format is the extracted audio?
a2: The audio is extracted as a WAV file, which is a lossless uncompressed format. WAV files are universally compatible with all audio players and editors.
q3: Is there a file size limit?
a3: The tool supports videos up to 500 MB. Processing happens entirely in your browser, so larger files may take longer depending on your device.
